pullrequest.title: Migrate ServerFixture (and tests) to use ignition::math

content.raw:
If I may make a request in a busy time like this, could we add default values of `ignition::math::Vector3d::Zero` as defaults for xyz and rpy for all these functions?

Another thing we might want to consider is changing rpy to Quaternion, but that will be a bit more work.
content.html:
If I may make a request in a busy time like this, could we add default values of ignition::math::Vector3d::Zero as defaults for xyz and rpy for all these functions?

Another thing we might want to consider is changing rpy to Quaternion, but that will be a bit more work.
